messages.title: PAUL HOLMES: A STRONG LOCAL VOICE
messages.content: As your Conservative Candidate at the General Election on 8th June, I have a plan of action for Southampton Test and a proven track record of success in the City.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Living in Southampton for most of my adult life I know from experience the huge benefits a strong economy and thriving local businesses can bring to the City. That is why I have championed Southampton International Boat Show as an event locally and in Parliament.

After careful consideration, I voted for the United Kingdom to leave the European Union because Southampton and the United Kingdom can flourish outside of it. We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

issues.brexitEurope: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

politicalExperience.achievements: Proven track record of success in the City, making Southampton a successful and inclusive city that has rejuvenated much of the local area.

examples: As your Conservative Candidate at the General Election on 8th June, I have a plan of action for Southampton Test and a proven track record of success in the City.
Living in Southampton for most of my adult life I know from experience the huge benefits a strong economy and thriving local businesses can bring to the City.
Living in Southampton for most of my adult life I know from experience the huge benefits a strong economy and thriving local businesses can bring to the City.
Proven track record of success in the City, making Southampton a successful and inclusive city that has rejuvenated much of the local area.
We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.
A General Election now will strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe.
